content: Hi all! It's time to put your track proposal in for the May Connectathon! They are due March 23, 2021. Please go to the Connectathon 27 Page use the button at the top of the track lead check list here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+05+Connectathon+27
@Sandra Vance , That page notes a Track Lead Kickoff meeting tomorrow (3/16 at 4pm Eastern), but I do not see a link. Is that meeting still taking place?

I was unable to attend the track lead kickoff meeting. I've reviewed the slides and there's a statement that says to not use the connectathon mgmt stream for our track-specific topics. It doesn't state what we're supposed to use. Do we create a new stream? Thx.
If there is an existing stream relevant to your IG/technology, point people to that. If there isn't, create a new stream.
